gate_name: Sprint 1 Quality Gate: Core Auth Security
criteria: >80% unit test coverage; All integration tests for auth flows (Register, Verify, Login, Logout, Reset) passing; Manual security review of password hashing, JWT signing, and token blocklist logic completed and approved.
success_metrics: Zero critical security bugs found; All core auth flows are functional and secure.

gate_name: Sprint 2 Quality Gate: Advanced Security & Automation
criteria: All E2E tests for MFA and Deletion flows passing; CI/CD pipeline successfully deploys to staging without manual intervention; SAST/SCA/DAST scans are clean of high/critical vulnerabilities; Terraform plan is clean and successfully applies.
success_metrics: Fully automated, secure path to production is established; All advanced security features are demo-ready.
